title: Michelle Obama's Blanket Fort | Colbert Classic
description:
There's a place you can go where everything you knew as a child is still true. It's called The Late Show Blanket Fort, and back in 2016 it was under heavy security when the First Lady paid a visit.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
